import breeze.numerics.sqrt
import ca.savitestbed.monarch.storage.HbaseDriver
import com.github.nscala_time.time.Imports._
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD
import org.apache.spark.sql.{DataFrame, SQLContext}
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext
import ca.savitestbed.monarch.fileprocessor._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.{Graph, Edge}
hdfsfolders: String = hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/0/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/1/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/2/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/3/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/4/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/5/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/6/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/7/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/monitoring/parquet/METER_NAME_HERE/2016/3/8/8/*,hdfs://monarch-master/user/ubuntu/mon...startTime: String = 2016-03-01 01:00:00
endTime: String = 2016-03-22 23:59:00

// -------------------------------------------------------read the data objects till the openflow/networking part
val rid_disctime__cpuutil = VmCPUUtil.calculatePeriodAvgPerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).map(s => ((s._1, s._2._1), s._2._2.toDouble)).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__diskrb = VmDiskReadByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__diskwb = VmDiskWriteByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__netinbyte = VmNetIncomingByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)
val rid_disctime__netoutbyte = VmNetOutgoingByte.calculateDerivativePerRidFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime).coalesce(10)




  
  
  

  
  

// -------------------------------------------------------read the networking data objects
val commPairDisctimeBwutil = OFFlowBw.calculatePeriodAvgPerCommPairFromFile(sqlContext, hdfspaths, startTime, endTime)
val macToRid = Utils.getMacToVMRid(sqlContext)
val ridToId = Utils.getVMRidToID(sqlContext)
val idToRid = ridToId.map(ri => (ri._2.toLong, ri._1))

// (rid, (mac, id))
val ridToMacId = macToRid.map(mr => (mr._2, mr._1)).join(ridToId)
val macToId = ridToMacId.map(rmi => rmi._2)

// produce (source Mac, ((des MAC, (discrete_time, average bandwidth)), srcVMid))
val convertedSrcMac = commPairDisctimeBwutil.map(p => (p._1, (p._2, p._3))).join(macToId)

// produce (dst Mac, ((srcVMId, (discrete_time, average bandwidth)), dstVMId))
val convertedSrcDstMac = convertedSrcMac.map(p => (p._2._1._1, (p._2._2, p._2._1._2))).join(macToId)

//((srcVMId, dstVMId, discrete_time), BW)
val idToIdDisctimeBw = convertedSrcDstMac.map(p => ((p._2._1._1, p._2._2, p._2._1._2._1), p._2._1._2._2))
  .reduceByKey((a, b) => a+b)

// Produce ((rid, dt), value)
val sendBWDisctimeBW = idToIdDisctimeBw
  .map(p => ((p._1._1, p._1._3), p._2))
  .reduceByKey((a, b) => a+b)
  .map(f => (f._1._1, (f._1._2, f._2)))
  .join(idToRid)//(id, ((dt, value), rid))
  .map(f => ((f._2._2, f._2._1._1), f._2._1._2))

// Produce ((rid, dt), value)
val receiveBWDisctimeBW = idToIdDisctimeBw
  .map(p => ((p._1._2, p._1._3), p._2))
  .reduceByKey((a, b) => a+b)
  .map(f => (f._1._1, (f._1._2, f._2)))
  .join(idToRid)//(id, ((dt, value), rid))
  .map(f => ((f._2._2, f._2._1._1), f._2._1._2))
  
  
//-------------------------------------------------join the data objects
val rid_dt__2:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_disctime__cpuutil.join(rid_disctime__diskrb)
      .filter(s => s._2._1.isInstanceOf[Double] && s._2._2.isInstanceOf[Double])
      .map(s => (s._1, Array[Double](s._2._1, s._2._2)))

val rid_dt__3:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__2.join(rid_disctime__diskwb)
  .map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))

val rid_dt__4:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__3.join(rid_disctime__netinbyte)
  .map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))

val rid_dt__5:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__4.join(rid_disctime__netoutbyte)
  .map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))

val rid_dt__6:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__5.join(receiveBWDisctimeBW)
  .map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))

val rid_dt__7:RDD[((String, Long), Array[Double])] = rid_dt__6.join(sendBWDisctimeBW)
  .map(s => (s._1, s._2._1 :+ s._2._2))
  
  
  
//-----------------------------------------------some processing needed for the graph generation
val ridIdJoin = rid_dt__7.map(s => (s._1._1, (s._1._2, s._2))).join(ridToId)
val idDtData = ridIdJoin.map(s => ((s._2._2,s._2._1._1), s._2._1._2))
//(time,(Array,id))
val DtDataid = idDtData.map(s => (s._1._2,(s._2,s._1._1)))
//(time,(id,Array))
val DtidData = idDtData.map(s => (s._1._2,(s._1._1,s._2)))
//(time,((srcid,destid),BW))
val DtSrcIdDstIdBW = idToIdDisctimeBw.map(s => (s._1._3,((s._1._1,s._1._2),s._2)))

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark def cleanfile(filename): ret_dict = {} with open(filename) as f: graph_list = [] for line in f: ## get the key t_key = "" for x in line: if x == "(": pass elif x == ",": break else: t_key += x ## list of preprocessed vertices list_vert = str(line).split("Vetrex") ## list of preprocessed edges list_edges = str(list_vert[-1]).split("edge") ## update last element in vertices list_vert[-1] = list_edges[0] list_vert = list_vert[1:] list_edges = list_edges[1:] ## dict of vertices and edges vert_dict = {} edge_list = [] for v in list_vert: ed_v = v list_chs = " ()List" for x in list_chs: ed_v = ed_v.replace(x,"") if ed_v[0] == ",": ed_v = ed_v[1:] if ed_v[-1] == ",": ed_v = ed_v[:-1] ded_v = ed_v.split(",") vkey = ded_v[0] vval = ded_v[1].split(".") vert_dict[vkey] = vval for e in list_edges: ed_e = e list_chs = " ()\n" for x in list_chs: ed_e = ed_e.replace(x,"") if ed_e[0] == ",": ed_e = ed_e[1:] if ed_e[-1] == ",": ed_e = ed_e[:-1] eval = ed_e.split(",") edge_list.append(eval) ret_tuple = (t_key,[vert_dict,edge_list]) graph_list.append(ret_tuple) return graph_list #print(t_key) #print(list_vert[0]) #print(list_vert[1]) #print(list_vert[-1]) #print(list_edges[0]) #print(list_edges[1]) #print(list_edges[-1]) #print("Step 1") #print(ed_v) #print(ded_v) #print(vkey) #print(vval) #print("Step 2") #print(ed_e) #print(eval) def build_graph(g_dict): # function to build graph, input is a list of vert_dict and list_edge G=nx.DiGraph() for v in g_dict[0].keys(): G.add_node(v) for e in g_dict[1]: G.add_edge(e[0],e[1]) return G def process_graph(G): return nx.degree_centrality(G) def show(p): img = StringIO.StringIO() p.savefig(img, format='svg') img.seek(0) print "%html
" + img.buf + "
"

%pyspark
from __future__ import print_function
import networkx as nx
import numpy
from networkx import algorithms
from networkx.algorithms import approximation as approx

import re
filename = "/home/ubuntu/collectedgraph0803.txt"
# list of (time, [vert_dict,edge_list])
graph_list = cleanfile(filename)
# Rdd of list( tupe(time, [v_dict, edge_list]) ) 
graph_sc = sc.parallelize(graph_list)
graph_sc_key = graph_sc.sortByKey()
graph_build = graph_sc_key.map(lambda s: (s[0],build_graph(s[1])))
graph_degree_connectivity = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.node_connectivity(s[1])))
graph_degree_centrality = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.degree_centrality(s[1])))
graph_degree_centrality_mean = graph_degree_centrality.map(lambda s: sum(s[1].values())/len(s[1].values()))
graph_is_directed_acyclic_graph = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.is_directed_acyclic_graph(s[1])))
graph_number_connected_components = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.number_connected_components(s[1])))
graph_is_weakly_connected = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.is_weakly_connected(s[1])))
graph_dag_longest_path_length = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.dag_longest_path_length(s[1])))
graph_number_strongly_connected_components = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.number_strongly_connected_components(s[1])))
graph_number_weakly_connected_components = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],nx.number_weakly_connected_components(s[1])))

print(graph_degree_radius.take(10))



#graph_sc_built.foreach(print)

%pyspark
import numpy
graph_strongly_connected_components_graph = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],[s[1].subgraph(x) for x in sorted(nx.strongly_connected_components(s[1]), key = len, reverse=True)][0:4] ))
graph_strongly_connected_components_graph_num = graph_strongly_connected_components_graph.map(lambda s: (s[0],[(x,nx.number_of_nodes(x)) for x in s[1]] ))
print(graph_strongly_connected_components_graph.take(1))
print(graph_strongly_connected_components_graph_num.take(1))
graph_strongly_connected_components_graph_atrributes = graph_strongly_connected_components_graph_num.map(lambda s: (s[0],[(x[0],nx.number_of_nodes(x[0]),nx.node_connectivity(x[0]),nx.degree_assortativity_coefficient(x[0])) for x in s[1]] ))
print(graph_strongly_connected_components_graph_atrributes.take(1))

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

graph_strongly_connected_components = graph_build.map(lambda s: (s[0],list(nx.strongly_connected_components(s[1])) ))
print(graph_strongly_connected_components.take(3))
mean_cent_list = []
max_cent_list = []
c_size_list = []
mixed_list = []
mean_cent_list_big = []
max_cent_list_big = []
c_size_list_big = []
mixed_list_big = []
for c in graph_strongly_connected_components.take(1)[0][1]:
    mean_cent = 0
    max_cent = []
    for v in list(c):
        mean_cent += graph_degree_centrality.take(1)[0][1][v]
        max_cent.append(graph_degree_centrality.take(1)[0][1][v])
    mean_cent_list.append(mean_cent/len(c))
    max_cent_list.append(max(max_cent))
    c_size_list.append(len(c))
    mixed_list.append((len(c),max(max_cent)))
    if len(c) >= 4:
        mean_cent = 0
        max_cent = []
        for v in list(c):
            mean_cent += graph_degree_centrality.take(1)[0][1][v]
            max_cent.append(graph_degree_centrality.take(1)[0][1][v])
        mean_cent_list_big.append(mean_cent/len(c))
        max_cent_list_big.append(max(max_cent))
        c_size_list_big.append(len(c))
        mixed_list_big.append((len(c),max(max_cent)))
    
print(mean_cent_list)
print(max_cent_list)
print(c_size_list)
print("separate")
print(mean_cent_list_big)
print(max_cent_list_big)
print(c_size_list_big)
print([max_cent_list_big[i]/mean_cent_list_big[i] for i in range(len(mean_cent_list_big))])
mixed_list_RDD = sc.parallelize(mixed_list)
mixed_list_RDD = mixed_list_RDD.map(lambda p: Row(Size=p[0], Centrality=p[1]))

%pyspark
df = sqlc.createDataFrame(graph_number_strongly_connected_components.map(lambda x: (x[1], )),schema =  ['c'])

# Register to use in SQL
df.registerTempTable('graph_number_strongly_connected_components')

%sql
select c, count(1) value
from graph_number_strongly_connected_components
group by c 
order by c

%pyspark
df = sqlc.createDataFrame(graph_degree_centrality_mean.map(lambda x: (x, )),schema =  ['c'])

# Register to use in SQL
df.registerTempTable('graph_degree_centrality_mean')

%sql
select c, count(1) value
from graph_degree_centrality_mean
group by c 
order by c

%sql
select Size, Centrality
from mixed_list_RDD
group by Size ,Centrality
order by Size
